scripts.postbuild: npm run build-js-bundle && npm run build-get-started-bundle && npm run build-recipe-bundle && npm run build-all-pages
scripts.postdev: watch 'npm run build:dev' _sass | npm run watch-js-bundle | npm run watch-get-started-bundle | npm run watch-recipe-bundle | bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.watch-js-bundle: watchify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t babelify --extension=.jsx --extension=.js -vd dynamic/react/api-app/index.js --outfile public/js/api-bundle.js
scripts.build-js-bundle: browserify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --extension=.jsx --extension=.js dynamic/react/api-app/index.js --outfile public/js/api-bundle.js
scripts.watch-get-started-bundle: watchify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t babelify --extension=.jsx --extension=.js -vd dynamic/react/get-started/index.js --outfile public/js/get-started-bundle.js
scripts.build-get-started-bundle: browserify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --extension=.jsx --extension=.js dynamic/react/get-started/index.js --outfile public/js/get-started-bundle.js
scripts.watch-recipe-bundle: watchify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t babelify --extension=.jsx --extension=.js -vd dynamic/react/api-recipes/index.js --outfile public/js/recipe-bundle.js
scripts.build-recipe-bundle: browserify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t babelify --extension=.jsx --extension=.js dynamic/react/api-recipes/index.js --outfile public/js/recipe-bundle.js
scripts.pretest: npm run build && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.pretest-web: npm run test && bundle exec jekyll serve --detach && rm -rf _test/browser/_results
